reviewText: A+++++Transaction! Just as it should be !! Thanks!!
The North  and South Miniseries videotapes were in great condition and were easily viewed. The quality was good and we enjoyed watching them!

THERE SHOULD BE AN "I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT" RATING.  THIS IS ONE OF THE BEST SERIES EVER.  I DON'T THINK THERE IS ANYTHING OUT THERE NEAR AS GOOD AS THIS.  THIS SERIES IS PART OF MY COLLECTION OF VERY SPECIAL MOVIES AND IT WILL NEVER BE DONE AWAY WITH.  THIS IS SOMETHING THAT EVEN THOUGH I HAVE SEEN IT SEVERAL TIMES, I NEVER TIRE OF WATCHING IT.

OH TO FIND ANOTHER SERIES AS GOOD.
